articles.title: P200 wage hike to cause layoffs, PH retailers warn
articles.description: The country’s largest group of retailers warned that the P200 wage hike bill passed by the House of Representatives could lead to layoffs.
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines — The country’s largest group of retailers warned that the P200 wage hike bill passed by the House of Representatives could lead to layoffs and cause even more problems.

articles.title: Sensational Sarah Healy secures first Diamond League victory in Rome
articles.description: Sarah Healy called on all her speed and racing craft to claim the first Diamond League win of her career in Rome on Friday night, the Dubliner kicking to victory over 1500m at the Stadio Olimpico in 3:59.17.
articles.content:
Sarah Healy called on all her speed and racing craft to claim the first Diamond League win of her career in Rome on Friday night, the Dubliner kicking to victory over 1500m at the Stadio Olimpico in 3:59.17.

articles.title: Supreme Court Lets DOGE View Social Security Data
articles.description: In a second order, the court ruled that, for now, DOGE does not have to hand over internal records to a government watchdog group as part of a lawsuit.
articles.content:
The Supreme Court on Friday let members of the Department of Government Efficiency, formed by Elon Musk, have access to sensitive records of the Social Security Administration.
The court’s order was brief and unsigned, which is typical when the justi... [457 chars]

articles.description: Kilmar Ábrego García, who was mistakenly deported by the Trump administration in March, is being charged with human trafficking.

Novak Djokovic and Jannik Sinner embrace after the semi-finals ( Reuters )

articles.title: Tottenham sack Ange Postecoglou and weigh up move for £10m Thomas Frank
articles.description: Tottenham have sacked Ange Postecoglou and are considering whether to replace him with Brentford’s Thomas Frank, who has a £10m release clause
articles.content: Tottenham have sacked Ange ­Postecoglou as their manager, describing it as “one of the toughest decisions we have had to make”, and are considering whether to replace him with Brentford’s Thomas Frank, who has a £10m release clause. Marco Silva of Fu... [4010 chars]
